entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande Rivière Airport 05:13 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 17.
